Keywords: Brotherhood of Mutants , Excalibur , X-Men
Real Name: Anna Marie LeBeau
Special Powers
HOW ABOUT A KISS, SUGAH?: Rogue starts the game on click #4. // Steal Energy. When she uses it, she may heal past her starting line.
ABSORBED SPEED: Charge, Flurry.
SOUTHERN CHARM: Invincible, Willpower.

She just wrecked house in a 300 point sealed. Put a pair of empowers and perplexes with her, she was unstoppable,
August 24, 2022
hoojeebo
Yes, characters with Steal Energy will heal if they hit while being Mind Controlled. Of note is that nowhere in the SE power description does it say "may".
August 24, 2022
bam
Fun Fact: My Rogue came without a drawn starting line on Click 4. Did everyone else's Rogue arrive like that? I also wanted to ask if she is taken over by mind control & hits some one does she still get to heal because of Steal Energy?
August 23, 2022
No-Name
I've been out of the game for a long time now, but I'll say that according to the wording, she can't. The only thing that can heal her past her starting line is Steal Energy.

bam
Can Rogue be healed past her starting line by X-Men T.A.? I'm gonna say no.. but I could be wrong.
July 14, 2022
Bobcat2022
[QUOTE=heyodern;12204139]Doh. I still have some gaps in my brain on rule changes from taking 10 years off. So she's have one 12-attack hit, followed by a flurry at 12 on the next turn? Or would she be able to click up mid-flurry to that 13-attack for the third attack?[/QUOTE] Hey, welcome back. Nope, she can't click up mid-Flurry. The healing from Steal Energy doesn't happen until "after resolutions," which isn't until after both attacks of the Flurry have already happened. If she hit and damaged a character with both attacks of the Flurry, though, she'll heal up twice after the Flurry is over - once from each hit. This as distinct from hitting with Quake, where she's only making one attack no matter how many characters she's targeting/hitting/damaging. From the current PAC (Empyre) on WizKids' Rules page: [QUOTE]FLURRY: CLOSE: Make up to two close attacks STEAL ENERGY: When this character hits and damages one or more characters with a close attack, after resolutions heal this character 1 click.[/QUOTE] From the current HeroClix Comprehensive Rulebook ("updated 5.19.2021") [QUOTE]8.1c “After Resolutions” Triggered Effects Some effects that trigger state that they resolve “after resolutions”. These effects wait for the current action or effect in which they were triggered in to fully resolve before they can begin resolving.[/QUOTE]
July 12, 2022
heyodern
Doh. I still have some gaps in my brain on rule changes from taking 10 years off. So she's have one 12-attack hit, followed by a flurry at 12 on the next turn? Or would she be able to click up mid-flurry to that 13-attack for the third attack?
July 11, 2022
hoojeebo
I'll do ya one better: she has to hit AND damage an opposing character to heal 1 with Steal Energy. But yes, she would only heal 1 click for hitting 1 or more characters, not 1 for each character she hit and damaged.
July 11, 2022
ComicJunkie
Since rules update of WW80 Steal Energy heals 1 damage for hitting 1 or more characters. She has to hit 3 times to get to click 1.
July 8, 2022
heyodern
That 12-attack quake to steal energy up 2-3 clicks is nasty. Just pure filth, setting up a chance for a 13-attack, 5-damage charge/flurry, with willpower and invincible on a 19 defense. She might misfire. Maybe. But for 60 points she's worth the gamble.
